availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: A Kentucky farmer. Lived in Hancock County, Kentucky in 1860. Married to Theodosia Elmina Crawford Younger. Father of John Samuel Younger, Mary Ann "Annie" Younger, Maria Jean "Jennie" Younger", Davies Crawford Younger, Claudius Clarendon Younger, Evaline Younger, and Luella Elmina Younger. Owned seven enslaved persons in 1860. Member of the Democratic Party. Registered for the draft in Hancock County in 1863.

bibl.p: Hancock County, Kentucky, Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registrations, 1863-1865, NM-65, entry 172, 620 volumes. NAI: 4213514.
